name: agentscore-mcp
description: Trust scoring for AI agents. Investigate, verify, and compare agent trustworthiness through MCP.
author: Tripti Mishra

scripts.test:suite: node test/public-ready.test.mjs && node test/demo-adapter.test.mjs && node test/code-quality.test.mjs && node test/adapter-contract.test.mjs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:suite
scripts.coverage: npm run build && c8 --all --exclude='examples/**' --exclude='dist/server.js' --exclude='dist/adapters/demo/agents.js' --exclude='dist/**/*.d.ts' --exclude='dist/**/*.map' --check-coverage --lines 60 --functions 65 --branches 60 --statements 60 npm run test:suite
scripts.benchmark: npm run build && node benchmarks/run.mjs --dataset benchmarks/datasets/demo-gold.v1.json --out benchmarks/results/latest.json
scripts.verify: npm run coverage && npm run package:check
